Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: wǒ zhǐ yīnggāi jiè zhēnzhǔ de míngyì ér xuānyán zhēnlǐ. Wǒ què yǐ cóng nǐmen de zhǔ nàlǐ gěi nǐmen dài láile yīgè míngzhèng, suǒyǐ, nǐ yīnggāi shìfàng yǐsèliè de hòuyì, ràng tāmen tóng wǒ yīqǐ lí qù.”
Tā shuō:“Rúguǒ nǐ yǐ dài láile yī zhǒng jīxiàng, nǐ jiù bǎ tā ná chūlái ba, rúguǒ nǐ shì chéngshí de rén.”
Tā jiù pāo xià tā de shǒuzhàng, nà tiáo shǒuzhàng hūrán biàn chéng yītiáo mǎng
Tā chōuchū tā de shǒu lái, nà zhī shǒu zài guānzhòng de yǎnqián hūrán xiǎn chū báiguāng
Fǎlǎo de bǎixìng zhōng de zhòng lǐngxiù shuō:“Zhè què shì yīgè gāomíng de shùshì
tā xiǎng bǎ nǐmen zhú chū guójìng. Nǐmen yǒu hé jiànjiào ne?”
Tāmen shuō:“Qǐng nǐ kuānróng tā hé tā gēgē, bìng pài zhāomù yuán wǎng gè chéngshì qù
tāmen huì bǎ suǒyǒu gāomíng de shùshì dōu zhào dào nǐ yùqián lái.”
Shùshìmen lái jiàn fǎlǎo, tāmen shuō:“Rúguǒ wǒmen huòshèng, wǒmen huì dédào bàochóu ma?”
Tā shuō:“Shì de, nǐmen bìdìng shǔyú qīnxìn zhī liè.”
Tāmen shuō:“Mù sà a! Nǐ xiān pāo (nǐ de shǒuzhàng) ne, háishì wǒmen xiān pāo (wǒmen de) ne?”
Tā shuō:“Nǐmen xiān pāo ba!” Dāng tāmen pāo xiàqù shí,(biàn chū de dàshé) xuànhuòle zhòngrén de yǎnjīng, érqiě shǐ rénmen kǒngbù. Tāmen shīzhǎnle dà móshù.§
Wǒ qǐshì mù sà shuō:“Nǐ pāo chū nǐ de shǒuzhàng ba.” Yúshì, nà tiáo shǒuzhàng lìkè xiāomièle tāmen suǒ huànhuà de (dàshé)
Yúshì, zhēnlǐ zhāozhù, ér tāmen suǒ yǎn de móshù biàn chéng wúyòng de
Fǎlǎo děng dāngchǎng bàiběi, yī biàn ér wéi qūrǔ zhě
Shùshìmen shēn bù yóujǐ de bàidǎo xiàqù
